title: Treasure Island Music pack
description: Amazing high-definition music pack. 10 tracks in the style of ocean adventure and travel will add an unforgettable impression of your game.
longDescription:
All tracks DEMO listen HERE

Tracklist:

1. Starting the voyage

2. Sailing

3. Through the ocean

4. Empty city

5. The long way home

6. Storm

7. Last Obstruction

8. Missing

9. Lighthouse In The Dark

10. Strange Island

1. Starting the voyage

- Simple leitmotif melody. Perfect for game menu or main theme

- Association: Remembrance, Calmness, Sorrow, Solitude, Menu. Dialogs. Leitmotif. Wind. Loneliness. Expectation.

2. Sailing

- Pleasant music. Nostalgic atmosphere.

- Association: Planet. Soil. Water. Plant. Human. Flight. Rain. Plan. Past. Story. Legend.

3. Through the ocean

- Light astonishing symphonic theme

- Association: Road. Adventure. Emotions. Developments. Violin. Brass. Freedom. Ocean. Capital. Exhibition. Palace.

4. Empty city

- Mysterious landscapes of the dark ambient

- Association: Cosmos. Loneliness. Void. Another Dimension. Black Hole. Cave. Ritual. Magic. Curse.

5. The long way home

- Perfect melody for any landscapes

- Association: Fight. Search. Landscape. Nature. Leitmotif. Training. Meditation. Temple.

6. Storm

- Anxious melody with drums and strings

- Association: Final. Explosion. Disappearance. Storm. Fight. Shaft. Despair. Losing.

7. Last Obstruction

- Inspiring melody for hopes and dreams

- Association: Search. Loneliness. Surprise. Old Friends. Final Fight. Coach. Fight. Hope

8. Missing

- Bright and peaceful melody. Nostalgic atmosphere

- Association: Sorrow. Adventure. Miracle.Magic.

9. Lighthouse In The Dark

-Inspiring melody for hopes and dreams

10. Strange Island

-Mysterious landscapes of the dark ambient
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Waves: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: r 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
